name: Hermeto Pascoal
description: '''Hermeto Pascoal Oliveira da Costa''' (22 June 1936 â€“ 13 September 2025) was a Brazilian composer and multi-instrumentalist. Pascoal was best known in [[music of Brazil|Brazilian music]] for his orchestration and improvisation, as well as for being a [[record producer]] and contributor to many Brazilian and international albums.
